column4: i cant figure out why... even with FF 1.5 i still get 50% cpu load...
i cant figure out why... even with FF 1.5 i still get 50% cpu load... ne1?
you tried removing your firefox config?
is it just firefox?
i followed the wiki guide on how to install the ff 1.5
maybe you have wrong settings or wrong plugins
thats why you should try removing your configuration
in your user directory, remove .mozilla or .firefox
this wont affect my ff 1.5?
you will have to setup the configuration again if you dont like the defaults .. like the default homepage and such stuff
i see no .mozilla or .firefox
not possible, there has to be some configuration in /home/username/.mozilla
wuts the del cmd? (linux newbie here)...
open up a terminal and type "rm -r .mozilla/firefox"
to dell the dir entirly?
yes, just the firefox directory
but i have some plugins and such...
if you installed them system-wide, you will still have them
it says something on a defautl dir... which is write protected...
if not, you will have to backup them first or download them again - but maybe thats the problem, for example some defect plugin which uses 50% cpu
